comments.raw_text:
When running browser chrome tests (i.e. a set of tests), it would be nice if the UI displayed some type of progress like standard mochitest-chrome tests display. This way, if you're running a large number of tests, you'd have an idea of at least how many tests have been run, and how many are left to run. 

It could be placed in the auxiliary window that comes up with the tests -see attachment.
